title: Crisis hits end-of-life care.
text: The covid-19 pandemic has encouraged more people to make advance treatment decisions relating to CPR and ventilation, reports Clare Wilson.
abstract: The covid-19 pandemic has encouraged more people to make advance treatment decisions relating to CPR and ventilation, reports Clare Wilson.

similar.title: What comes after the ICU?
text: Some people with covid-19 need ventilation. Those who survive this will need a lot of physical and mental rehabilitation, finds Clare Wilson.
abstract: Some people with covid-19 need ventilation. Those who survive this will need a lot of physical and mental rehabilitation, finds Clare Wilson.

similar.title: Coronavirus crisis hits ice-locked Arctic research expedition.
text: Coronavirus crisis hits ice-locked Arctic research expedition.

similar.title: Men hit harder by covid-19.
text: From lifestyle to immune system differences, there are a number of reasons why men may be more affected by covid-19, reports Graham Lawton.
abstract: From lifestyle to immune system differences, there are a number of reasons why men may be more affected by covid-19, reports Graham Lawton.

similar.title: COVID-19 Hits Cancer Research Funding.
text: As the COVID-19 pandemic stretches on, investigators are becoming increasingly concerned about longer-term effects on grants and funding for cancer research. Institutions and philanthropic organizations are especially likely to be hit hard by the economic crisis, with effects that will be particularly acute for early-career investigators.
abstract: As the COVID-19 pandemic stretches on, investigators are becoming increasingly concerned about longer-term effects on grants and funding for cancer research. Institutions and philanthropic organizations are especially likely to be hit hard by the economic crisis, with effects that will be particularly acute for early-career investigators.
